text: geudeul-eun alji moshaneunyo hananim-eun geudeul ijeon-ui manh-eun sedaeleul myeolmangke hayeossnola geu sedaeleul jisang-e jeongjuke han hu neohuideul-egeneun buyeoha ji anihan gwonneung-eul jueoss-eumyeo haneul eseo bileul naeligehayeo mul-eul pungbu hage hayeossgo mul-i heuleuneun gangdeul-eul dueoss-eudoe geudeul-i joeag-eulo malmiam-a hananim-eun geudeul-eul myeolmangkehago da-eum sedaeleul dusieossnola
